actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed transfer by the Federal Republic of Germany to other European countries of ribbon bridges manufactured using technical data of United States origin.

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed transfer by West Germany to other European countries of ribbon bridges manufactured from U.S. technical data packages acquired under the foreign military sales program.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed transfer by the Federal Republic of Germany to other European countries of ribbon bridges manufactured using technical data of United States origin.
